trans-unit.source: Creates an activity to do synchronous or asynchronous batch work that can use COM+ services without needing to create a COM+ component.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma atividade para realizar o trabalho do batch síncronos ou assíncronos que pode utilizar os serviços de COM+ sem necessitar de criar um componente do COM+.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The context associated with the activity is completely determined by a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object.
trans-unit.target: O contexto associado com a atividade completamente é determinado por uma <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>objeto.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity> that is used to submit batch work to COM+ services.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>que é utilizado para submeter trabalho do batch para serviços do COM+.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>

trans-unit.source: The context associated with the activity is completely determined by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object that is passed through the `cfg` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O contexto associado com a atividade completamente é determinado pelo <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>objeto que é transmitido através do `cfg` parâmetro.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref> that contains the configuration information for the services to be used.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"> </xref> que contém as informações de configuração para os serviços a utilizar.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"></xref> is not supported on the current platform.
Runs the specified user-defined batch work asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Executa o trabalho do batch especificado definido pelo utilizador no modo assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"></xref> object that is used to implement the batch work.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"> </xref> objeto que é utilizado para implementar o trabalho do batch.

trans-unit.source: Binds the user-defined work to the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Vincula o trabalho definido pelo utilizador para o thread actual.

trans-unit.source: BindToCurrentThread binds the batch work that is submitted by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall%2A> or <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A> methods to the current single-threaded apartment (STA).
trans-unit.target: BindToCurrentThread vincula o trabalho de batch que é submetido pelo <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall%2A>ou <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A>métodos para o atual único thread de apartamento (STA).</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall%2A>

trans-unit.source: BindToCurrentThread has no effect if the current thread is being run in the multithreaded apartment (MTA).
trans-unit.target: BindToCurrentThread não tem qualquer efeito se a thread atual está a ser executado no apartamento multithread (MTA).

trans-unit.source: The current thread model is determined by the configuration of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.ThreadPool%2A> property of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de thread atual é determinado pela configuração do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.ThreadPool%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>objeto.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.ThreadPool%2A>

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified user-defined batch work synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Executa o trabalho do batch especificado definido pelo utilizador de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"></xref> object that is used to implement the batch work.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"> </xref> objeto que é utilizado para implementar o trabalho do batch.

trans-unit.source: Unbinds the batch work that is submitted by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall*> or <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall*> methods from the thread on which the batch work is running.
trans-unit.target: Desvincula o trabalho de batch que é submetido pelo <> </> *> ou <> </> *> métodos do thread no qual está a executar o trabalho do batch.

trans-unit.source: UnbindFromThread has no effect if the batch work was not previously bound to a thread.
trans-unit.target: UnbindFromThread não tem qualquer efeito se o trabalho do batch não foi anteriormente vinculado a um thread.
